### Fux
###### Flawless unambiguous programming
The beautiful alternative for C++ 
- so you don't shoot yourself in the foot (like I did working on Fux)
- with better errors (well, better than just `Segmentation fault`)
- where `*` has nothing to do with pointers
- and without strict syntax

```cpp
get * core;

main() -> void {

    profile -> int;
    run = true;

    cout << "Input a number: ";
    (int)cin >> profile;
    endl;

    while (run) {

        switch (profile) {

            case (-1) profile *= profile;
            case (0) profile++++;
            case (1) profile--;
            case (2) profile++;
            default !run;
            
        }

        cout << profile << endl;

    }

}
```
